entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text:
@KamalaHarris When American lives were on the line, President Trump made the smart decision to restrict travel from China, where the coronavirus started.

Joe Biden attacked him for it, calling him "xenophobic" & accusing him of "fear-mongering."

Biden got it wrong. 

Trump got it right ! https://t.co/gIV9CxhnN8
